blog1Title: Welcome to the Salty Karma family.
blog1Description: It is finally here ! The official website of the Salty Karma studio on which you will regularly find blogs on various subjects and in particular DevBlogs on the studio's next project which will be announced very soon! To celebrate this with you, I offer you a retrospective on the genesis of the studio until its creation and the release of the first game: The Big One.
blog2Title: How did I learn to make video games?
blog2Description: Do you also dream of making your own video games? Would you like to learn to code or use software such as Unity, but you don't know where to start? Then you are in the right place! In this blog I will detail my learning journey with all the useful links that I followed to become a video game developer.
